pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Projected Averaged Regression // A flexible framework combining variable screening and random projection techniques for fitting ensembles of predictive generalized linear models to high-dimensional data. Designed for extensibility, the package implements key techniques as S3 classes with user- friendly constructors, enabling easy integration and development of new procedures for high-dimensional applications. For more details see Parzer et al (2024a) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2312.00130 and Parzer et al (2024b) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2410.00971.
